<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_step"><sys_atf_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><callable_outputs/><copied_from/><description>Run Server Side Validation Script</description><display_name>Run Server Side Script</display_name><inputs/><mugshots_cache_json/><notes/><order>1</order><step_config display_value="Run Server Side Script">41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a</step_config><sys_class_name>sys_atf_step</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 15:36:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>11e25fe73b90725062bf612c95e45a5d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run Server Side Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Deployer WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_deployer">394148f9db1c2d906a03dad1f396197a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Deployer WORK IN PROGRESS">394148f9db1c2d906a03dad1f396197a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_step_11e25fe73b90725062bf612c95e45a5d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 15:52:17</sys_updated_on><table/><test display_value="Deployer - Deployer Controller API - Start Deployment">45e25fe73b90725062bf612c95e45a1f</test><timeout/><warning_message/></sys_atf_step><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=11e25fe73b90725062bf612c95e45a5d"/><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>11e25fe73b90725062bf612c95e45a5d</document_key><order>100</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 15:36:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>15e25fe73b90725062bf612c95e45a5e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 15:36:59</sys_updated_on><value>3.1</value><variable display_value="Jasmine version">42f2564b73031300440211d8faf6a777</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>11e25fe73b90725062bf612c95e45a5d</document_key><order>200</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 15:36:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>5de25fe73b90725062bf612c95e45a5e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 15:52:18</sys_updated_on><value>(function(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual)
{
	var test = new x_snc_devtools.TestAPI(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);
	
	test.SetResult(true);
	
	
	function TestCase_DeployerControllerAPI_StartDeployment(oBasicAuth, params, vExpected)
	{
		function TestCase_DeployerControllerAPI_StartDeployment_CheckResult(vInput,vExpected,vResult)
		{
			var vResultParsed = x_snc_devtools.ParseJson(vResult);
			test.Log('Parsed result:\n'+x_snc_devtools.RenderValue(vResultParsed));
			if (vExpected == 'SUCCESS')
			{
				if (x_snc_devtools.GetValue(vResultParsed,'result','message') == 'SUCCESS')
				{
					return true;
				}
				return false;
			}
			if (x_snc_devtools.GetValue(vResultParsed,'error','message') == vExpected)
			{
				return true;
			}
			return false;
		}
		
		var strUrl = '';
		strUrl += x_snc_devtools.GetInstanceUrl();
		strUrl += '/api/x_snc_deployer/controller/start_deployment';

		var strUrlParams = x_snc_devtools.MakeUrlParameters(params);
		if (strUrlParams != '')
		{
			strUrl += '?' + strUrlParams;
		}
		
		test.TestCase_HttpRequest(
			'Deployer Controller API / Start Deployment',
			{
				url: strUrl,
				basicauth: oBasicAuth
			},
			vExpected,
			TestCase_DeployerControllerAPI_StartDeployment_CheckResult);

	}

	TestCase_DeployerControllerAPI_StartDeployment(null,{},'User Not Authenticated');

	TestCase_DeployerControllerAPI_StartDeployment(null,{ hello: 'world'},'User Not Authenticated');

	
	return test.GetResult();
	
})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);</value><variable display_value="Test script">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>
